description: a(n) = |{m : multiplicative order of 8 mod m=n}|.
comments: The multiplicative order of a mod m, gcd(a,m)=1, is the smallest natural number d for which a^d = 1 (mod m). a(n) = number of orders of degree-n monic irreducible polynomials over GF(8).
formula: a(n) = Sum_{ d divides n } mu(n/d)*tau(8^d-1), (mu(n) = Moebius function A008683, tau(n) = number of divisors of n A000005).
maple: with(numtheory):a:= n-> add(mobius(n/d)*tau(8^d-1), d=divisors(n)):seq(a(n), n=1..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 12 2012
crossrefs: Column k=8 of A212957. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 12 2012
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 06 2001
